steps.name: turnOnPower
steps.summary: Turn on the power by activating both switches and linking the power grid.

notes: The power switches are located in the Power Room.

steps.name: getBrainRot
steps.summary: Obtain any weapon with the Brain Rot ammo upgrade

steps.name: openHotelRoom
steps.summary: Shoot a zombies with the Brain Rot weapon to make it open up Hotel Room 305

steps.name: obtainMicrowaveDish
steps.summary: Obtain Microwave Dish

steps.name: obtainRoboticHands
steps.summary: Obtain Robotic Hands

steps.name: obtainBattery
steps.summary: Obtain Battery by killing the Krazny Soldat at round 11

steps.name: buildKlaus
steps.summary: Assemble Klaus.
notes: Klaus is essential for completing many steps of the Easter egg.

steps.name: getKillsWithKlaus1
steps.summary: Get approximately 45 kills with Klaus

steps.name: weakenTheLabBrickWall
steps.summary: Bring Klaus to the Lab's secret location so that he punches and weakens it.

steps.name: obtainWonderWeapon
steps.summary: Obtain the CRBR-S Wonder Weapon.
notes: The Wonder Weapon is crucial for completing later steps.

steps.name: obtainCRBRBlazer
steps.summary: Obtain the CRBR-S Blazer upgrade

steps.name: meltLab
steps.summary: Shoot the CRBR-S at the now exposed metal wall to open up the Lab

steps.name: upgradeKlaus
steps.summary: Upgrade Klaus to level 1 by guiding him to the Upgrade Station and protecting him during the process.
notes: Upgrading Klaus allows access to specific areas required for the Easter egg.

steps.name: getTheBlacklight
steps.summary: Bring Klaus near the Locker to obtain the Blacklight

steps.name: blackLightNumber1
steps.summary: Use the Blacklight to obtain the first number of the safe

steps.name: blackLightNumber2
steps.summary: Use the Blacklight to obtain the second number of the safe

steps.name: blackLightNumber3
steps.summary: Use the Blacklight to obtain the third number of the safe

steps.name: retrieveIDCard
steps.summary: Retrieve the ID Card from the Safe in the Hotel Room 305.
notes: Use Klaus to open the Safe in Room 305.

steps.name: retrieveWarhead
steps.summary: Retrieve the Warhead by placing the ID Card into the secret lab terminal.
notes: This step triggers a special wave of zombies.

steps.name: neutralizeWarhead
steps.summary: Neutralize the Warhead by completing the lockdown event.
notes: Protect the Warhead from zombies during the lockdown.

steps.name: chargeWarhead
steps.summary: Charge the Warhead by collecting Aetherium Crystals and placing them in the reactor.
notes: The Aetherium Crystals are dropped by Elite enemies.

steps.name: launchWarhead
steps.summary: Launch the Warhead to destroy the Omega Outpost.
notes: Launching the Warhead triggers the final boss fight.

steps.name: defeatValentina
steps.summary: Defeat Valentina, the final boss, and stop the outbreak.
notes: Valentina has multiple phases, each with unique attacks.

steps.name: escapeMauerDerToten
steps.summary: Escape Mauer Der Toten after defeating Valentina.
notes: This concludes the Easter egg and triggers the ending cutscene.
